Params: {2: 'AWACS', 3: 'Dagger 1, Babylonia has taken back the launch center of Airforce Base 28. Do you copy? I repeat. Do you copy?'}
{3: "Watanabe and Cyril's frames clash, then separate."}

{3: "A duel between elite soldiers doesn't always require a spectacle of flashy skills or intricately woven vapor trails in the azure sky. Sometimes, the difference between life and death is decided in a single stroke."}
{3: 'The moment they clash, Cyril hears a rupturing sound from behind—knowing it was the precursor to missile shrapnel piercing his skin.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Hehe, how's Bruce's performance in the military?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...He's always the front of the pack.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Well, if he's doing better than you... I guess I can relax.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Believe what you choose to believe and stick to your guns.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "I still can't forgive... But... Maybe I just can't forgive myself...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Go home, kid... Someone's gotta keep us in their heart...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Don't let the world... forget what we fought for...", 4: '1'}
